message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $95. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $85 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I could meet you halfway.  Would you be willing to do $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
